error.signature: regex::Error: CompiledTooBig: compiled regex exceeds size limit

verdict.summary: The regex pattern is either invalid or exceeds the default size limit. Simplify the pattern or increase the limit.

dead_ends.action: Set the size limit to usize::MAX
dead_ends.why_fails: Massive regexes consume excessive memory and CPU; potential denial of service

workarounds.action: Increase the size limit with RegexBuilder
Use lazy_static or once_cell to compile regex once

leads_to.condition: When regex fails lead to switching to parser combinators

preceded_by.condition: When regex crate is not imported

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Regex compile error is about pattern size/syntax; nom incomplete is about insufficient input data
